name: Sewer of Fortune
description:
Sewer of fortune is a first-person adventure game where players have to choose paths and actions to determine the storyline of a young man who is desperate to become a sewer hunter, someone who finds treasure in sewerage and ends up trapped in a sewer with the terror of monsters.

WASD to Move

E to Interact

F to Grab

G to Flashlight

Ihsan Game Designer & Project Manager & Level Designer 

Dimas 2d Artist 

Rio 3d Artist & Animator 

Gege Programmer 

Aga Vfx & Sound Designer&Programmer
